issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

components.name: Titanium SDK & CLI

fields.description:
Hi
We are facing one critical issue with ios builds created with Xcode version 9.2 and 9.3.
The builds are crashing on iOS 12 beta version 10 on launch.
fields.summary: Crashing issue with iOS builds created using Xcode version 9.2 and 9.3
fields.environment:
Ti SDK 7.2.0.GA
CLI 7.0.4
Xcode version 9.2 and 9.3
iOS 12 Beta version 10 public release.

comments.body: Sorry, but "it crashes" cannot help us fixing this. I assume you tried our Xcode 10 / iOS 12 compatible SDK version 7.4.0 ({{ti sdk install -b 7_4_X}}) already? If so, please provide a reproducible test case and we will take a look.
Hello, [~shumne], Could you please get around providing us with a sample reproducible test code and your crash log? Thanks.
